Class RandomPlanet

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SuperSmoothMover
        • Planet
          • RandomPlanet
  • public class RandomPlanet
extends Planet
    The class RandomPlanet represents a randomly generated planet in the game. It extends the abstract class Planet and implements specific behavior for random planets. Random planets can have different images, health points, and interact with asteroids in the world. Usage:
  • Create instances of RandomPlanet in the game world.
  • Random planets move to the right and may spawn new planets at a certain distance.
  • They have health points and a health bar that decreases on collision with asteroids.
  • On reaching zero health points, they may spawn a new planet and are removed from the world.
  • Random planets can generate trees or roses based on game conditions.
Version:
November 2023
Author:
Jiayi Li

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomPlanet

        public RandomPlanet()
        Constructor for the RandomPlanet class. Initializes the random planet's image, size, health, speed, and health bar.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment. Moves the random planet, checks for collisions, updates the health bar, and checks if the random planet should be removed.
        Overrides:
        act in class Planet

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision()
        Checks for collisions with asteroids and updates health points. Triggers an explosion effect and adds new asteroids to the world on collision.
        Specified by:
        checkCollision in class Planet

      • randomImage

        public void randomImage()
        Sets a random image for the random planet. Scales the image size within a specific range.

      • getHpBar

        public SuperStatBar getHpBar()
        Returns the health bar associated with the random planet.
        Returns:
        The SuperStatBar object representing the health bar.

      • addedToWorld

        public void addedToWorld​(greenfoot.World w)
        Adds the health bar to the world when the RandomPlanet is added.
        Overrides:
        addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor

      • removeRanPlanet

        public void removeRanPlanet()
        Removes the random planet, its health bar, and associated trees from the world.

      • generateTrees

        public void generateTrees()
        Generates four trees around the random planet based on its position.

      • checkAndRemove

        public void checkAndRemove()
        Checks if the random planet should be removed based on its health points. If health points are less than or equal to zero, the planet is removed. Additionally, if the planet is to the left of or at X-coordinate 600, it may spawn a new planet.

      • generateRose

        public void generateRose()
        Generates a rose at the top of the random planet when roses are enabled in the game.
